mapper.sql: org_id, org_name, farm_id, farm_name, pig_id, pig_code, origin, is_auto, event_at, `type`, kind, `name`, `desc`, barn_id, barn_name, barn_type, rel_event_id, rel_group_event_id, rel_pig_event_id, change_type_id, price, amount, pig_status_before, pig_status_after, parity, is_impregnation, is_delivery, preg_days, feed_days, preg_check_result, dp_npd, pf_npd, pl_npd, ps_npd, py_npd, pt_npd, jp_npd, npd, group_id, farrow_weight, live_count, health_count, weak_count, mny_count, jx_count, dead_count, black_count, wean_count, wean_avg_weight, current_mating_count, check_date, matting_date, farrowing_date, abortion_date, partwean_date, doctor_mate_type, mate_type, boar_code, out_id, status, event_source, extra, source, breed_id, breed_name, breed_type_id, breed_type_name, boar_type, judge_preg_date, quantity, weight, customer_id, customer_name, basic_id, basic_name, vaccination_id, vaccination_name, remark, operator_id, operator_name, creator_id, creator_name, updator_id, updator_name, created_at, updated_at

mapper.select:
SELECT ifnull(round(AVG (live_count), 2), 0) avgPigLetCount, ifnull(round(AVG (wean_count), 2), 0) avgWeanCount, ifnull(round(sum(farrow_weight) / sum(live_count), 2), 0) avgBirthWeight, ifnull(round(AVG (wean_avg_weight), 2), 0) avgWeanWeight, ifnull(round(AVG (health_count), 2), 0) avgHealthCount, ifnull(round(AVG (weak_count), 2), 0) avgWeakCount, ifnull(round(AVG (dead_count), 2), 0) avgDeadCount, ifnull(round(AVG (mny_count+jx_count+black_count), 2), 0) avgMujiCount FROM
WHERE pig_id = #{pigId} AND status = 1

SELECT
FROM
WHERE group_id = #{groupId} AND status = 1

SELECT
FROM
WHERE pig_id = #{pigId} AND status = 1 AND id > #{eventId} ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT pig_id FROM
WHERE 1=1

SELECT
FROM
WHERE type = 16 AND status = 1 AND extra = '{"#":"#"}'

SELECT
FROM
WHERE type = 16 AND status = 1 AND is_auto = 1 AND extra is NULL

SELECT
FROM
WHERE status = 1 AND pig_id = #{pigId} AND event_at <= date_format(#{eventAt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND ( type in (6, 7, 9, 11, 14, 15, 16) OR (type = 20 AND barn_type = 7 AND pig_status_before = 4) OR (type = 19 AND pig_status_before = 9) )
ORDER BY event_at desc , id DESC limit 1

FROM

FROM

FROM

update ( select id, pig_id from
where farm_id IN
#{farmId}
and type =20 ) a left join
b on a.pig_id = b.pig_id set b.event_source = 5 where b.id < a.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM
WHERE farm_id IN
#{farmId}

select sum( case when type = 15 then `live_count` else 0 end + case when type = 19 then quantity else 0 end - case when type = 16 then wean_count else 0 end - case when type in(17,18) then quantity else 0 end ) from
where pig_id = #{pigId} and status = 1 and type in (15, 16, 17,18,19)

SELECT farm_id, event_at FROM
where type = 15 and extra not like '%nextCode%' group by farm_id, date_format(event_at, '%Y-%m')
mapper.update: UPDATE (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, a.id, replace(extra, '}', concat(',"nestCode":', '"', date_format(event_at, '%Y%m'), '-',@rownum, '"', '}')) as extra from doctor_pig_events a, (select @rownum:= -1) b where farm_id = #{farmId} and type = 15 and extra not like '%nestCode%' and event_at >= #{begin} and event_at <= #{end} order by event_at, id) c left join doctor_pig_events d on c.id = d.id set d.extra = c.extra
mapper.select:
SELECT farm_id as farmId, min(event_at) as eventAt FROM
WHERE updated_at >= #{startDate} group by farm_id

select farm_id as farmId, min(event_at) as eventAt from
group by farm_id

SELECT event_at as eventAt FROM
WHERE pig_id = #{pigId} and (pig_status_before != #{status} OR pig_status_before is NULL) and pig_status_after = #{status} order by id DESC limit 1

SELECT count(1) FROM
WHERE pig_id = #{pigId} AND `type` = 9 AND pig_status_before = 9 AND status = 1

SELECT id, extra FROM
farm_id= #{farmId} AND type = 12 AND created_at > '2017-03-09'

SELECT
FROM
pig_id = #{pigId} AND parity = #{parity} AND status = 1 AND event_source != 5 order by event_at desc, id desc

select * from doctor_pig_events where id = ( select max(id) from doctor_pig_events b where b.id < #{id} and b.pig_id = #{pigId}
and b.type in (9,20)
and b.type in (15,20)
and b.type in (7,11,20,16)
and b.type in (9)
and b.type!=3 and b.type!=4 and b.type!=5 and b.type!=17 and b.type!=18 and b.type!=19 and b.type!=1 and b.type!=10 and b.type!=12 and b.type!=14
)
SELECT id FROM doctor_pig_events WHERE pig_id = #{pigId} ORDER BY event_at DESC ,id DESC limit 1
select id from doctor_pig_events where pig_id = #{pigId} and kind = 1 and type in (1,10,12,14) and event_at < #{time} and event_at >= #{eventAt} and id > #{id} order by id limit 1
select event_at,live_count from doctor_pig_events where event_at < #{time} and pig_id = #{pigId} and type = 15 order by id desc limit 1
select id from doctor_pig_events where farm_id = #{farmId} and pig_id = #{pigId} and kind = 2 and type = 1 and event_at >= #{eventAt} order by id limit 1
SELECT a.barn_name as barn_name, b.staff_name as staff_name FROM doctor_pig_events a , doctor_barns b where a.id = #{isBoarBarn} and a.barn_id = b.id
